introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: Unlock Your Facial Potential with Our AI Face Rate System
introduce.label: HOW IT WORKS
introduce.description: Experience our AI face rate technology - a sophisticated attractiveness test powered by advanced algorithms trained on millions of faces. Our system analyzes your unique facial features using the golden ratio, symmetry, and key proportions to provide objective, data-driven feedback about your attractiveness. Get accurate insights through our streamlined AI face rate process that combines precision with ease of use.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: QUESTIONS?
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions about our AI face rate service? We've got answers. Find out more about our unique attractiveness test, the technology behind it, and our privacy policies below.

items.title: How does the AI face rate actually work?
items.description: Our AI face rate system uses a type of artificial intelligence called a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). It's been trained on a massive, ethically sourced dataset of faces with varied ratings. When you upload your photo, the AI detects key facial landmarks, measures distances and ratios between them, analyzes symmetry, and compares these patterns to the data it learned during training to generate a score. It’s a purely mathematical and pattern-recognition process.

items.title: Is this attractiveness test accurate?
items.description: Our AI aims for objectivity and consistency, not subjective truth. 'Attractiveness' is highly subjective and culturally dependent. Our AI face rate measures aesthetic qualities based on geometric principles, symmetry, and patterns learned from its training data. It provides a consistent, data-driven score, which is a powerful metric but should be considered one of many perspectives on beauty. The accuracy lies in its consistency and unbiased methodology.

items.title: Are my photos and data safe?
items.description: Absolutely. Your privacy is our number one priority. Your photo is uploaded via a secure connection, processed in-memory, and then permanently deleted from our servers the moment your AI face rate report is generated. We do not store, share, or sell your photos or personal data. The entire attractiveness test process is anonymous and secure.

items.title: What information is included in my AI face rate report?
items.description: Your report includes an overall attractiveness score on a scale of 1-10. More importantly, it provides a detailed breakdown of individual facial features, including scores for facial symmetry, skin quality, jawline, nose shape, eye size and spacing, and lip volume. This granular detail is what makes our AI face rate a truly useful tool.

items.title: Can I do anything to improve my AI face rate score?
items.description: While your core facial structure is genetic, some factors can influence your AI face rate. These include photo quality (use clear, well-lit, front-facing photos), grooming, skincare (which affects the skin clarity score), and expression. The tool can be used to see how different hairstyles or angles might affect your perceived facial harmony. Our attractiveness test can help you find your best presentation.

items.title: How is your AI face rate different from other online rating apps?
items.description: Many other apps are based on simple filters or peer-voting, which is highly subjective and biased. Our uniqueness lies in our sophisticated AI, commitment to privacy (photo deletion), detailed feature breakdown, and foundation in geometric analysis. We provide a scientific-style attractiveness test, not a popularity contest. This makes our AI face rate a more reliable and private tool.
